attributes.action: Remove Part 3 of the Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill
attributes.additional_details: The Bill, specifically Part 3, is too loosely defined.  It will make the Human Right to protest unviable. It also allows Government to target unsympathetic causes and silence them. This is a dangerous and unnecessary action.  The Public Offences Act already covers dealing with protests.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012
